participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and creative, with a passion for music and helping others.
participant_1.background: i volunteer at the homeless shelter. my father played violin professionally. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i am a piano teacher on the side. i play several instruments.

participant_2.name: James Turner
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and introspective, with a love for literature and a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: i dance on the weekends. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i don't care about fashion.
